text: The 2002 NFL Europe season was the 10th season in 12 years of the American Football league that started out as the World League of American Football. The Barcelona Dragons changed their names to FC Barcelona Dragons. ==World Bowl X== Berlin 26-20 Rhein Saturday, June 22, 2002 Rheinstadion Düsseldorf, Germany. == References == Category:2002 in American football Category:NFL Europe (WLAF) seasons
title: 2002 NFL Europe season
